parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account. You do not need to specify this parameter because this parameter will be removed in the future.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the value, but you must ensure that it is unique among different requests. The **ClientToken** parameter can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the data synchronization instance resides. For more information, see [List of supported regions](~~141033~~).

parameters.name: SynchronizationDirection
parameters.description:
The synchronization direction. Valid values:

*   **Forward**
*   **Reverse**

> 
*   Default value: **Forward**.
*   This parameter is required only when the topology of the data synchronization instance is two-way synchronization.

parameters.name: SynchronizationJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the data synchronization instance. You can call the [DescribeSynchronizationJobs](~~49454~~) operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: SynchronizationReplicatorCompareEnable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable image matching. Valid values:

*   **true**: enables image matching
*   **false**: disables image matching
